translations: v．结交，交朋友：与某人建立友谊关系。
· She befriended the new girl in class.
她和班上的新女孩交了朋友。

sentences.translation: 一个年纪大些的女孩对我很友善。

sentences.sentence: Shortly after my arrival at the school, I was befriended by an older girl.
sentences.translation: 我到学校后不久便得到了一位年龄较大的女孩友善对待。

sentences.sentence: I don't want to make you feel bad; you've befriended me.
sentences.translation: 我不想让你们难过；你们待我这么好。
